title: Looting Bug?
body: Made a key earlier out of my 4 fragments, clicked on the OPEN button on the chests, and it just disappeared, I got nothing in return, I have tried relogging to no avail, and my purchase history shows that I got nothing new. Help?

replies.body:
I went ahead and looked into your hextech crafting history so I could track down that runaway chest content. As far as I can tell, it looks like you got a skin shard for Sun Goddess Karma from your most recent chest. 

Let me know if you're not seeing her in your loot!
Thanks man, I see her in my skin shard bank, but I still don't see it in my purschase history

It's not the best system quite yet, but we don't actually have a way for you to track these types of 'transactions'. Shard rerolls aren't technically purchases, but a sort of 'currency exchange' if you will. 

If you're ever unsure of what happened with some of your hextech crafting, feel free to reach back out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
